extDescription.message: Select link's text just like a regular text - Select like a Boss ;)

helpDescription.message: Now you can select link's text just like a regular text - Select like a Boss ;)

helpEnjoy.message: Enjoy! (and share the extension with other people)

helpNotice.message: Notice: some links can be unselectable

helpAttention.message: If you want to use the extension in the incognito mode too, do not forget to enable the checkbox [Allow in incognito] on the extensions page.
